theme_reveal.headline: Cybersecurity
theme_reveal.body: Key concepts used to protect systems, data, and users.

entries.clue: A process proving who you are, often via password, biometrics, or a code
Confirming what an authenticated user is allowed to do
A common technique where attackers trick users into revealing secrets
Extra security step beyond password; often abbreviated MFA
Scrambled data that can only be read with the right key
"Least privilege" model that trusts no one by default
